fields.name: svid
fields.description: SV ID for which this Almanac Data is (Valid Range: 1 .. 32 or 51, 56, 63)

fields.name: week
fields.description: Issue Date of Almanac (GPS week number)

adjudication.reasoning: The extraction correctly represents the legacy UBX-AID-ALM message structure found in u-blox M8 documentation. The message consists of a 4-byte SV ID, a 4-byte Week number, and 8 words (32 bytes) of almanac data, totaling 40 bytes. The description accurately notes that the message may be truncated to 8 bytes if no data is present, but the schema definition correctly models the full payload.
